name: Personalized Weather forecast to your Email
description:
Get daily weather updates delivered directly to your inbox with this automated weather forecast newsletter template. This automation uses real-time data from your selected location to provide a detailed 3-day forecast, including high and low temperatures in both °C and °F, weather conditions, and corresponding icons—all formatted in a clean and easy-to-read email layout. Stay informed and plan ahead without the need for manual checks.

You can expand this automation by saving the weather data forecast to your database, enabling predictive analytics for sales or logistics, or sending it to your favorite messenger app to keep your team updated. Perfect for businesses that depend on accurate weather forecasts.

Source: [OpenWeatherMap](https://openweathermap.org/)
